horizontal_recoil.description: Defined in degrees / second, first value is first shot, second value is when rounds fired.

vertical_recoil.description: Defined in degrees / second, first value is first shot, second value is when rounds fired.

horizontal_bias.description: In format Start / End: How much the recoil is biased, 0 is center.

random_amount.description: How much of the drift is random per axis. (0-1). Default 10% for vertical and 100% for horizontal. Higher values means larger range (1 is full).
